channel.title: cb on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in cb on Barefoot Rob

item.title: great meetings
item.description: 21:06 Monday 30 October 2017 JST Meeting was fine and then the next meeting was great! Actually first meeting was great and the second was awesome I was really worried about the first meeting and I didn’t even expect the second one to happen, so overall fantastic

item.title: Finished two CB tickets
item.description: 17:00 Tuesday 08 December 2015 JST Meeting with Satomi was fine as usual. yay! We got her inbox filters fixed so she actually sees emails sent from redmine when I do updates; because those emails were skipping her inbox (and redmine folder/tag) she didn’t see when I finished things and so didn’t approve them until the next meeting. Now they can preview things and I removed the unused sharing options (Mixi, Google+, Pinterest) from the (demo) site.

item.title: new cb site
item.description: 15:04 Monday 16 November 2015 JST Well the site is up, but it wasn’t as smooth as I had expected. For some reason some of the CSS is borked, though we tested it. bah.

item.title: working on CB site
item.description: 12:25 Friday 13 November 2015 JST Headed to CB to work on their site from 1pm to 5pm, before I gotta head out to my lesson. 17:25 Friday 13 November 2015 JST Didn’t finish before I had to leave, so I left. Then I came back to grab my suit jacket. Moe joe I don’t want to do this lesson bah. 21:27 Haha I’m headed back to CB to finish up changes to the touch version of their website.
